news.title: Gardaí arrest former TD in probe over his dead parents’ pensions
news.summary: A former TD is under investigation for allegedly claiming the pensions of his deceased parents, the  Irish Independent  can reveal.

news.title: ‘Manhunt for shooter’ after Donald Trump ally Charlie Kirk is killed in ‘political assassination’
news.summary: US conservative activist Charlie Kirk, an influential ally of President Donald Trump, was fatally shot on Wednesday while speaking at a Utah university, sparking a manhunt for a lone sniper who the governor said had carried out a political assassination.

news.title: ‘Farms wouldn’t be as successful without the women behind them,’ says first woman named Young Farmer of the Year
news.summary: The first woman to be named Young Farmer of the Year has said no farms would be “as successful as they can be without women behind them”.

news.title: Revealed: Cancer patients’ radiotherapy delays linked to old machines and staff shortage
news.summary: Cancer patients who need radiotherapy are facing treatment delays as hospitals struggle with a lack of key staff and old machines, it has emerged.

news.title: Entrepreneur Illann Power claims travel has been restricted by gardaí in ‘act of retaliation’
news.summary: Entrepreneur Illann Power, who is awaiting trial accused of almost 90 revenue and reckless filing offences, is seeking to have gardaí held in contempt for refusing to allow him to travel to the US while on bail.

news.title: Energia customers advised to switch to Electric Ireland when their contract ends
news.summary: Householders who get electricity from Energia have been advised to switch to Electric Ireland.

news.title: ‘Let’s say somebody is looking to purchase a home for €400,000… using First Home Scheme and Help to Buy, all they have to save is €10,000’
news.summary: We’ve all heard the complaint: how can young people buy a house when they can’t even save the 10pc deposit that’s needed?

news.title: The Fabulous Pharmacist Laura Dowling: ‘I grew up in Catholic Ireland, where vulvas and vaginas weren’t talked about, sex and periods weren’t talked about’
news.summary: A woman believed she had thrush for years. Too embarrassed to confide in anyone, she treated herself again and again. Eventually discovered the real issue was low oestrogen.

news.title: Aidan Fitzmaurice: Lack of selection controversy paints stark picture for future
news.summary: It’s been part of the furniture for the Irish squad for decades: the missing link, the outcast, the white knight, the saviour on the sidelines, the man who was unwanted but had the talent and strength to carry a nation to better times.

news.title: Restaurant review: ‘This SoCoDu gem is loud, glamorous and good-humoured. A little, dare I say, Celtic Tiger’
news.summary: The first time I ate at China Tang, soon after it opened earlier this year, I arrived late. By the time I got settled, there were already a lot of opinions. Rather than assume my default bossy mode, I demurred and went along with their choices.
